segments.text: We could easily provide you with a private vehicle , if you'd prefer .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Perhaps you'd like to take a beautiful limousine .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No , thank you . Taxis and I get along just fine .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No private vehicle , no limo . Got it . Where are you going ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm seeing a show at Rockefeller Center .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What time should the taxi be here to pick you up ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm ready to go right now .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'll have a taxi for you momentarily , sir .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Great ! As soon as I brush my teeth , I'll be downstairs .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You'll enjoy our new , clean taxis , sir .
segments.speaker: S2
